stanzas: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength. They shall mount up with wings, as eagles they shall run and not be weary. They shall walk and not faint. Teach me, Lord, teach me, Lord, to wait.

But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength. They shall mount up with wings, as eagles they shall run and not be weary. They shall walk and not faint. Teach me, Lord, teach me, Lord, to wait.
Fear thou not, for I am with thee. Be not dismayed, for I am thy God. I will strengthen thee. Yea, I will help thee. Yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
